        roomId - the room id
        eventType - the event type

        callback - the asynchronous callback called with the response

      • getRoomMessagesFrom

        @GET(value="/rooms/{roomId}/messages")
void getRoomMessagesFrom(@Path(value="roomId")
                                                                java.lang.String roomId,
                                                                @Query(value="dir")
                                                                java.lang.String dir,
                                                                @Query(value="from")
                                                                java.lang.String from,
                                                                @Query(value="limit")
                                                                int limit,
                                                                retrofit.Callback<TokensChunkResponse<Event>> callback)
        Get a list of messages starting from a reference..
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id
        dir - The direction to return messages from.
        from - the token identifying where to start
        limit - the maximum number of messages to retrieve
        callback - the asynchronous callback called with the response

                                                                   java.lang.String tag,

        roomId - the room id
        tag - the new room tag
        content - the event content
        callback - the asynchronous callback called with the response

      • setRoomDirectoryVisibility

        @PUT(value="/directory/list/room/{roomId}")
void setRoomDirectoryVisibility(@Path(value="roomId")
                                                                            java.lang.String roomId,
                                                                            @Body
                                                                            RoomState state,
                                                                            retrofit.Callback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Set the visibility of the given room in the list directory. If the visibility is set to public, the room name is listed among the directory list.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id where to apply the request
        state - state object containing the new guest access rule in its RoomState.visibility field
        callback - the asynchronous callback called when finished

      • getRoomDirectoryVisibility

        @GET(value="/directory/list/room/{roomId}")
void getRoomDirectoryVisibility(@Path(value="roomId")
                                                                            java.lang.String roomId,
                                                                            retrofit.Callback<RoomState> callback)
        Get the visibility of the given room in the list directory.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id where to apply the request
        callback - the asynchronous callback response containing the RoomState.visibility value
